title: BRIEF-Pfizer Canada Advises Health Canada That Some Epipen And Epipen Jr Auto-Injectors May Be Difficult To Remove From Their Carrier Tubes
text:
BRIEF-Pfizer Canada Advises Health Canada That Some Epipen And Epipen Jr Auto-Injectors May Be Difficult To Remove From Their Carrier Tubes

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 11, 2019 18:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pfizer Canada Advises Health Canada That Some Epipen And Epipen Jr Auto-Injectors May Be Difficult To Remove From Their Carrier Tubes Oct 11 (Reuters) - Health Canada: * HEALTH CANADA - PFIZER CANADA ADVISED HEALTH CANADA THAT SOME EPIPEN AND EPIPEN JR AUTO-INJECTORS MAY BE DIFFICULT TO REMOVE FROM THEIR CARRIER TUBES * HEALTH CANADA - NUMBER OF EPIPEN OR EPIPEN JR AUTO-INJECTORS WITH ISSUE IS ESTIMATED TO BE TWO AUTO-INJECTORS OUT OF EVERY ONE MILLION

BRIEF-Pfizer Canada Advises Health Canada That Some Epipen And Epipen Jr Auto-Injectors May Be Difficult To Remove From Their Carrier Tubes
